description: Delve into the world of interactive animations and engaging visuals with insights on using React Three Fiber and GLSL shaders. Explore CSS's evolving capabilities with container queries and the innovative `if()` function, offering a glimpse into its growing complexity. Discover new CSS features for styling separators and enhancing select menus, while design tokens and dynamic styling solutions streamline development workflows.
joke: Why did the CSS developer break up with the JavaScript developer? They couldn't find common class.
challenge: Challenge yourself to create an interactive particle animation using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Utilize the Canvas API to generate particles that respond to mouse movements. Add a twist by incorporating fluid-like simulations for a mesmerizing effect. Optionally, experiment with WebGL for enhanced performance and visual depth.
